taxon.author: (Scopoli, 1763)
taxon.distribution: Europe, Caucasus, Turkey, Iran, Russia (Europe to Central Asia)

referenceObject.reference: Scopoli, J. A. (1763). Entomologia carniolica, exhibens insecta carniolae indigena et distributa in ordines, genera, species, varietates. Methodo Linnaeana. Ioannis Thomae Trattner, Vindobonae [= Johannes Thomas Trattner, Wien/Vienna], 420 pp. (Araneae, pp. 392-404).
